amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 303 which established the Lessons Learned Center.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in part C of House Report 111-143 to strike section 303, establishment of the Lessons Learned Center.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Brown-Waite, Ginny amendment (A012) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Brown-Waite, Ginny.
